content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you may need HVAC assistance. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Linda. Could you please provide your service address so I can check our service availability in your area?
Thank you. One moment while I confirm if this address is within our service area.

I’m sorry, Linda, but it appears your address is outside of our current service area. Unfortunately, we won’t be able to assist at this location. If there’s another address or location where you need service, please let me know.

Oh, that might be why I couldn't find you before. I actually have a second place where I might need service, but I don't have the exact address right now. Can I get an idea of when you might be available?
Certainly! To help find available times for our HVAC technicians, could you please tell me your preferred days or times?
Hm, I’d need to check my calendar for the best times... I just realized I don’t have it with me now. Can I get back to you later?
Of course, Linda. Feel free to reach out to us whenever you’re ready to schedule. Have a great day!
reason: Customer did not provide scheduling information and stopped responding.
